<li id="cite_note-102"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-102">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFLangevinBarclay1990">Langevin P, Barclay RM (1990). "<i>Hypsignathus monstrosus</i>". <i>Mammalian Species</i> (357): 1–4. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.2307%2F3504110" rel="nofollow">10.2307/3504110</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/JSTOR_(identifier)" title="JSTOR (identifier)">JSTOR</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.jstor.org/stable/3504110" rel="nofollow">3504110</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Mammalian+Species&amp;rft.atitle=Hypsignathus+monstrosus&amp;rft.issue=357&amp;rft.pages=1-4&amp;rft.date=1990&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.2307%2F3504110&amp;rft_id=%2F%2Fwww.jstor.org%2Fstable%2F3504110%23id-name%3DJSTOR&amp;rft.aulast=Langevin&amp;rft.aufirst=P&amp;rft.au=Barclay%2C+RM&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-103"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-103">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFWeissengruberForstenpointnerPetersKübber-Heiss2002">Weissengruber GE, Forstenpointner G, Peters G, Kübber-Heiss A, Fitch WT (September 2002). <a class="external text" href="//www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1570911" rel="nofollow">"Hyoid apparatus and pharynx in the lion (Panthera leo), jaguar (Panthera onca), tiger (Panthera tigris), cheetah (Acinonyxjubatus) and domestic cat (Felis silvestris f. catus)"</a>. <i>Journal of Anatomy</i>. <b>201</b> (3): 195–209. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1046%2Fj.1469-7580.2002.00088.x" rel="nofollow">10.1046/j.1469-7580.2002.00088.x</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMC_(identifier)" title="PMC (identifier)">PMC</a> <span class="cs1-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a class="external text" href="//www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1570911" rel="nofollow">1570911</a></span>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external <li id="cite_note-112"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-112">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" <li id="cite_note-Hoffman&amp;Rowe-123"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Hoffman&amp;Rowe_123-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Hoffman&amp;Rowe_123-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFHoffmanRowe2018">Hoffman EA, Rowe TB (September 2018). "Jurassic stem-mammal perinates and the origin of mammalian reproduction and growth". <i>Nature</i>. <b>561</b> (7721): 104–108. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2018Natur.561..104H" rel="nofollow">2018Natur.561..104H</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1038%2Fs41586-018-0441-3" rel="nofollow">10.1038/s41586-018-0441-3</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30158701" rel="nofollow">30158701</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a> <a class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:205570021" rel="nofollow">205570021</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Nature&amp;rft.atitle=Jurassic+stem-mammal+perinates+and+the+origin+of+mammalian+reproduction+and+growth&amp;rft.volume=561&amp;rft.issue=7721&amp;rft.pages=104-108&amp;rft.date=2018-09&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1038%2Fs41586-018-0441-3&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A205570021%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F30158701&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2018Natur.561..104H&amp;rft.aulast=Hoffman&amp;rft.aufirst=EA&amp;rft.au=Rowe%2C+TB&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-124"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-124">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFWallisWatersDelbridgeKirby2007">Wallis MC, Waters PD, Delbridge ML, Kirby PJ, Pask AJ, Grützner F,  et al. (2007). </li>
<li id="cite_note-pmid19896964-135"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-pmid19896964_135-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-pmid19896964_135-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFLorenziniJohnsonOliverTresini2009">Lorenzini A, Johnson FB, Oliver A, Tresini M, Smith JS, Hdeib M,  et al. <li id="cite_note-144"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-144">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFOrr2005">Orr CM (November 2005). <li id="cite_note-157"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-157">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFSterbing-D'AngeloChadhaChiuFalk2011">Sterbing-D'Angelo S, Chadha M, Chiu C, Falk B, Xian W, Barcelo J,  et al. href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2011PNAS..10811291S" rel="nofollow">2011PNAS..10811291S</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span </li>
<li id="cite_note-168"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-168">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFFish2000">Fish FE (2000). <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160804111726/http://darwin.wcupa.edu/~biology/fish/pubs/pdf/2000PBZ-PlatToWhale.pdf" rel="nofollow">"Biomechanics and energetics in aquatic and semiaquatic mammals: platypus to whale"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Physiological and Biochemical Zoology</i>. <b>73</b> (6): 683–98. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/CiteSeerX_(identifier)" title="CiteSeerX (identifier)">CiteSeerX</a> <span class="cs1-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a class="external text" href="//citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.734.1217" rel="nofollow">10.1.1.734.1217</a></span>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1086%2F318108" rel="nofollow">10.1086/318108</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11121343" rel="nofollow">11121343</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a> <a class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:49732160" rel="nofollow">49732160</a>. <li id="cite_note-Smithsonian_Animal-190"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Smithsonian_Animal_190-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Smithsonian_Animal_190-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFWilsonBurnie2001">Wilson DE, Burnie D, eds. DK Publishing. pp. 86–89. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-7894-7764-4" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-7894-7764-4"><bdi>978-0-7894-7764-4</bdi></a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/46422124" rel="nofollow">46422124</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Animal%3A+The+Definitive+Visual+Guide+to+the+World%27s+Wildlife&amp;rft.pages=86-89&amp;rft.edition=1st&amp;rft.pub=DK+Publishing&amp;rft.date=2001&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F46422124&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-7894-7764-4&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-valkenburgh2007-191"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-valkenburgh2007_191-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-valkenburgh2007_191-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFVan_Valkenburgh2007">Van Valkenburgh B (July 2007). <a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093%2Ficb%2Ficm016" rel="nofollow">"Deja vu: the evolution of feeding morphologies in the Carnivora"</a>. <i>Integrative and Comparative Biology</i>. <b>47</b> (1): 147–63. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="cs1-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093%2Ficb%2Ficm016" rel="nofollow">10.1093/icb/icm016</a></span>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21672827" rel="nofollow">21672827</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Integrative+and+Comparative+Biology&amp;rft.atitle=Deja+vu%3A+the+evolution+of+feeding+morphologies+in+the+Carnivora&amp;rft.volume=47&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=147-63&amp;rft.date=2007-07&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1093%2Ficb%2Ficm016&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F21672827&amp;rft.aulast=Van+Valkenburgh&amp;rft.aufirst=B&amp;rft_id=%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1093%252Ficb%252Ficm016&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></span>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-203"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-203">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFMcGowanRehnNorlingKeeling2014">McGowan RT, Rehn T, Norling Y, Keeling LJ (May 2014). <li id="cite_note-parker95-212"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-parker95_212-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-parker95_212-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFMartenPsarakos1995">Marten K, Psarakos S (1995). </li>
<li id="cite_note-Delfour-214"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Delfour_214-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Delfour_214-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFDelfourMarten2001">Delfour F, Marten K (April 2001). <li id="cite_note-222"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-222">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFMatobaKutsukakeHasegawa2013">Matoba T, Kutsukake N, Hasegawa T (2013). <li id="cite_note-223"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-223">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15189218" rel="nofollow">15189218</a>. <a <li id="cite_note-233"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-233">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFBonessBowenBuhleierMarshall2006">Boness DJ, Bowen D, Buhleier BM, Marshall GJ (2006). <a class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/226692255" rel="nofollow">"Mating tactics and mating system of an aquatic-mating pinniped: the harbor seal, <i>Phoca vitulina</i>"</a>. <i>Behavioral Ecology and Sociobiology</i>. <b>61</b>: 119–130. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1007%2Fs00265-006-0242-9" rel="nofollow">10.1007/s00265-006-0242-9</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a> <a class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:25266746" rel="nofollow">25266746</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Behavioral+Ecology+and+Sociobiology&amp;rft.atitle=Mating+tactics+and+mating+system+of+an+aquatic-mating+pinniped%3A+the+harbor+seal%2C+Phoca+vitulina&amp;rft.volume=61&amp;rft.pages=119-130&amp;rft.date=2006&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1007%2Fs00265-006-0242-9&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A25266746%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft.aulast=Boness&amp;rft.aufirst=DJ&amp;rft.au=Bowen%2C+D&amp;rft.au=Buhleier%2C+BM&amp;rft.au=Marshall%2C+GJ&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F226692255&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-234"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-234">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFKlopfer1981">Klopfer PH (1981). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=ipjhBwAAQBAJ&amp;pg=PA1" rel="nofollow">"Origins of Parental Care"</a>.  In Gubernick DJ (ed.). <i>Parental Care in Mammals</i>. <li id="cite_note-Bar-On_2018-264"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Bar-On_2018_264-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFBar-OnPhillipsMilo2018">Bar-On YM, Phillips R, Milo R (June 2018). <a <li id="cite_note-278"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-278">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFLe_RouxFoxcroftHerbstMacFadyen2015">Le Roux JJ, Foxcroft LC, Herbst M, MacFadyen S (January 2015). <a class="external text" href="//www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4314262" rel="nofollow">"Genetic analysis shows low levels of hybridization between African wildcats (Felis silvestris lybica) and domestic cats (F. s. catus) in South Africa"</a>. <i>Ecology and Evolution</i>. <b>5</b> (2): 288–99. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" title="Freely accessible"><a class="external text" href="//www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4314262" rel="nofollow">4314262</a></span>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25691958" rel="nofollow">25691958</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" <li id="cite_note-primates-292"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-primates_292-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFEstradaGarberRylandsRoos2017">Estrada A, Garber PA, Rylands AB, Roos C, Fernandez-Duque E, Di Fiore A,  et al. <li id="cite_note-300"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-300">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFMachovinaFeeleyRipple2015">Machovina B, Feeley KJ, Ripple WJ (December 2015). <li id="cite_note-peres2006-302"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-peres2006_302-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFPeresNascimento2006">Peres CA, Nascimento HS (2006). </li>
<li id="cite_note-303"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-303">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFAltrichterBoaglio2004">Altrichter M, Boaglio G (2004). "Distribution and Relative Abundance of Peccaries in the Argentine Chaco: Associations with Human Factors". <i>Biological Conservation</i>. <b>116</b> (2): 217–225. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1016%2FS0006-3207%2803%2900192-7" rel="nofollow">10.1016/S0006-3207(03)00192-7</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Biological+Conservation&amp;rft.atitle=Distribution+and+Relative+Abundance+of+Peccaries+in+the+Argentine+Chaco%3A+Associations+with+Human+Factors&amp;rft.volume=116&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=217-225&amp;rft.date=2004&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1016%2FS0006-3207%2803%2900192-7&amp;rft.aulast=Altrichter&amp;rft.aufirst=M&amp;rft.au=Boaglio%2C+G&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></span>
</li>

<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1054258005">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul li{list-style:none}@media(max-width:720px){.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{padding-left:1.6em;text-indent:-1.6em}}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns ul{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns li{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}</style><div class="refbegin" style="">
<ul><li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFBrown2001">Brown WM (2001). "Natural selection of mammalian brain components". <i>Trends in Ecology and Evolution</i>. <b>16</b> (9): 471–473. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1016%2FS0169-5347%2801%2902246-7" rel="nofollow">10.1016/S0169-5347(01)02246-7</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Trends+in+Ecology+and+Evolution&amp;rft.atitle=Natural+selection+of+mammalian+brain+components&amp;rft.volume=16&amp;rft.issue=9&amp;rft.pages=471-473&amp;rft.date=2001&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1016%2FS0169-5347%2801%2902246-7&amp;rft.aulast=Brown&amp;rft.aufirst=WM&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFMcKennaBell1997">McKenna MC, Bell SK (1997). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=id=zS7FZkzIw-cC" rel="nofollow"><i>Classification of Mammals Above the Species Level</i></a>. New York: Columbia University Press. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-231-11013-6" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-231-11013-6"><bdi>978-0-231-11013-6</bdi></a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/37345734" rel="nofollow">37345734</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Classification+of+Mammals+Above+the+Species+Level&amp;rft.place=New+York&amp;rft.pub=Columbia+University+Press&amp;rft.date=1997&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F37345734&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-231-11013-6&amp;rft.aulast=McKenna&amp;rft.aufirst=MC&amp;rft.au=Bell%2C+SK&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Did%3DzS7FZkzIw-cC&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFNowak1999">Nowak RM (1999). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=T37sFCl43E8C" rel="nofollow"><i>Walker's mammals of the world</i></a> (6 ed.). Baltimore: Johns Hopkins University Press. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-8018-5789-8" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-8018-5789-8"><bdi>978-0-8018-5789-8</bdi></a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/937619124" rel="nofollow">937619124</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Walker%27s+mammals+of+the+world&amp;rft.place=Baltimore&amp;rft.edition=6&amp;rft.pub=Johns+Hopkins+University+Press&amp;rft.date=1999&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F937619124&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-8018-5789-8&amp;rft.aulast=Nowak&amp;rft.aufirst=RM&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DT37sFCl43E8C&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFSimpson1945">Simpson GG (1945). "The principles of classification and a classification of mammals". <i>Bulletin of the American Museum of Natural History</i>. <b>85</b>: 1–350.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Bulletin+of+the+American+Museum+of+Natural+History&amp;rft.atitle=The+principles+of+classification+and+a+classification+of+mammals&amp;rft.volume=85&amp;rft.pages=1-350&amp;rft.date=1945&amp;rft.aulast=Simpson&amp;rft.aufirst=GG&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMammal"></span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFMurphyEizirikO'BrienMadsen2001">Murphy WJ, Eizirik E, O'Brien SJ, Madsen O, Scally M, Douady CJ,  et al. (December 2001). <li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFSpringerStanhopeMadsende_Jong2004">Springer MS, Stanhope MJ, Madsen O, de Jong WW (August 2004). <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160729033207/http://www.zi.ku.dk/evolbiology/courses/ME04/7_9/springer200-phyl.pdf" rel="nofollow">"Molecules consolidate the placental mammal tree"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Trends in Ecology &amp; Evolution</i>. <b>19</b> (8): 430–8. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1016%2Fj.tree.2004.05.006" rel="nofollow">10.1016/j.tree.2004.05.006</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16701301" rel="nofollow">16701301</a>. <div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Extant_mammal_orders" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Mammals" title="Template:Mammals"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Mammals" title="Template talk:Mammals"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Mammals&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Extant_mammal_orders" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">Extant <a class="mw-selflink selflink">mammal</a> orders</div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2"><div id="*_Kingdom_Animalia_*_Phylum_Chordata_*_Subphylum_Vertebrata_*_(unranked)_Amniota">
<ul><li>Kingdom <a href="/wiki/Animal" title="Animal">Animalia</a></li>
<li>Phylum <a href="/wiki/Chordate" title="Chordate">Chordata</a></li>
<li>Subphylum <a href="/wiki/Vertebrate" title="Vertebrate">Vertebrata</a></li>
<li>(unranked) <a href="/wiki/Amniote" title="Amniote">Amniota</a></li></ul>
